perturb_temp.f90

00002 !  ===============================================================
00003 !
00004 !                       PERTURB_TEMP 
00005 !
00006 !   $Revision$
00007 !
00008 !   Add temperature perturbation to isotropic thermal distrib. 
00009 !
00010 !  ===============================================================
00011 
00012 
00013 subroutine perturb_temp 
00014 
00015   use physvars
00016   use treevars
00017   use utils
00018 
00019   integer :: i,p, iseed1
00020   real :: Te0, deltaT, k_therm, s
00021   real :: lambdaT, xpert, xpe
00022 
00023 
00024 ! Scale velocities by space-dep. temperature perturbation 
00025 
00026 Te0=Te_keV
00027 xpert=xl*0.8
00028 lambdaT = xpert/kpert
00029 k_therm = 2*pi/lambdaT   ! Perturbation wavenumber - leave 10% buffer at either end 
00030 deltaT0 = tpert*Te0  ! 50% temperature variation 
00031 if (me==0) then 
00032   write(*,*) 'PEPC-B | Doing electron temperature perturbation'
00033   write(*,*) 'PEPC-B | Wavelength: ',lambdaT
00034 endif
00035 
00036 do i=1,npp
00037   if (q(i)<0 .and. x(i) >= 0.1*xl .and. x(i) < 0.9*xl) then
00038       xpe = x(i)-xl/10. 
00039      deltaT = deltaT0 * sin(k_therm*xpe)
00040      s = sqrt((deltaT+Te0)/Te0)
00041      ux(i) = s*ux(i)
00042      uy(i) = s*uy(i)
00043      uz(i) = s*uz(i)
00044   else
00045 ! buffer region at Te0
00046   endif
00047 enddo
00048  
00049 
00050 end subroutine perturb_temp
